description: A CEO, a man with black hair wearing glasses and a grey suit, sitting at a desk holding a folder and a pen, in a fancy office
text: CEO: Chris, John, I need you to design our new AI product.

description: Chris and John, a woman with brown hair wearing a red short dress and stilettos, and a man with black hair wearing glasses and a blue suit, sitting at a desk, with computers and papers
text:
Chris: What about a product to improve customer service?
John: I think we can create a chatbox that will generate answers using Generative AI.

description: Chris and John, a woman with brown hair wearing a red short dress and stilettos, and a man with black hair wearing glasses and a blue suit, sitting at a desk, with computers and a blueprint
text:
Chris: This is perfect! Let's create a prototype.
John: It would be a revolution for the company!

description: Chris and John, a woman with brown hair wearing a red short dress and stilettos, and a man with black hair wearing glasses and a blue suit, running towards a man with a hat and a vest, holding a wrench
text:
Chris: Bob, we need your help!
John: We designed the blueprint!

description: Chris, John, and Bob, a woman with brown hair wearing a red short dress and stilettos, a man with black hair wearing glasses and a blue suit, and a man with a hat and a vest, holding a wrench, standing in a workshop with tools and machinery
text:
Chris: Can you build it?
Bob: Of course! I love building new things!

description: Chris, John, Bob, and the CEO, a woman with brown hair wearing a red short dress and stilettos, a man with black hair wearing glasses and a blue suit, and a man with a hat and a vest, standing in a fancy office, displaying a blueprint and a computer
text:
Chris: Here is the blueprint.
John: And here is the prototype.
CEO: I believe this will be a great success!
